title: Back To Iraq With Donnie Does
description:
On today's ZBT we've got 4 rounds in the magazine ... Round #1: Our resident travel guide Donnie Does went to Iraq and his experiences were much different than mine. I got shot, he got margaritas. Round #2: A ZBT news roundup if you’re short on time, and never you worry the stories all rhyme (goddmanit Kate) Round #3: People always ask us about what types of jobs are out there for when you get out of the military. There’s lots and some involve pig semen and drones. Round #4: Interview - Minority Vets/Firewatch on the Hill SUPPORT THE SHOW!!
